snippet: The world’s most distinctive gallery of world leaders, the work of George W. Bush, who took up painting after he left office, opens in Dallas on Saturday.
abstract: Exhibit of portraits of international leaders painted by former Pres George W Bush, noted amateur artist known as W, opens at George W Bush Presidential Center in Dallas; show, which marks W's official debut, peels back the curtain on the hobby that has consumed him, and intrigued many others, over the last couple of years.
lead_paragraph: The world’s most distinctive gallery of world leaders, the work of George W. Bush, who took up painting after he left office, opens in Dallas on Saturday.

headline.seo: George Bush’s Portrait Exhibition Opens in Dallas
headline.main: An Ex-President, Brush in Hand, Captures His Fellow Leaders
headline.print_headline: A Former President, Brush in Hand, Frames His Views of Foreign Leaders

keywords.value: Bush, George W, Presidential Library and Museum
keywords.name: organizations
